ygData.subject: Re: Re: Fireworks
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, what an ultimately surprising turn of events, eh? Well, heres an idea, maybe there are A different types of firewaters, that result in more powerful
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, what an ultimately surprising turn of events, eh? Well, heres an idea,
maybe there are A different types of firewaters, that result in more
powerful fireworks, who knows, qwith tinkering anything is possible.....man
....damn I laughed forever when I heard about the third book, I almost
slapped myself across the face. It made me go insane almost LOL. Damn, I
wish I could go back to EQ now, but that is litterally impossible for me to
do right now. :(

>Has anyone tried combining 1 of each of the 4 fireworks... Maybe it makes
>some
>kind of mega-firework :)
>
